rulesStrings.li: quality_line->It feels intimate, like you are in the room with the players.
quality_line->Transients snap and tones bloom with ease.
quality_line->Silence between notes carries weight.
quality_line->Textures layer cleanly without crowding.
quality_line->Movement through the stereo field feels intentional.
quality_line->Low end is tight and musical.
quality_line->Vocals sit forward without harshness.
quality_line->Details appear the closer you listen.
quality_line->Complex parts remain effortless to follow.
quality_line->Punch arrives then gets out of the way.
quality_line->Ambience frames the performance rather than hiding it.
quality_line->It stays compelling at any volume.
quality_line->Nothing is wasted, everything serves the song.
quality_line->Precision that never feels clinical.
production_quality->Expert balance that rewards close listening.
production_quality->Transient handling preserves impact and tone.
production_quality->EQ sculpting reveals depth without glare.
production_quality->Stereo imaging is stable and dimensional.
production_quality->Dynamics expand naturally with the performance.
production_quality->Room cues create a convincing stage.
production_quality->Harmonics are rich without haze.
production_quality->Headroom is abundant and well used.
